languages.text: {n}Следуя советам, данным грозным Космическим волком, надзиратели провели серию расправ и акций устрашения. Оставляя за собой изувеченные трупы, проникая под пологом тьмы в стан бунтарей, они подорвали их боевой дух и заставили бросить оружие.{/n}

{n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the overseers carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Следуя советам, данным грозным Космическим волком, надзиратели провели серию расправ и акций устрашения. Оставляя за собой изувеченные трупы, проникая под пологом тьмы в стан бунтарей, они подорвали их боевой дух и заставили бросить оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens have carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind the mutilated corpses,and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed their morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

{n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens have carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind the mutilated corpses,and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed their morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

{n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

{n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

{n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the overseers carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行星上的看守遵照令人敬畏的太空野狼的建议，实施了一系列报复和恐吓行动。他们留下残破的尸体，在黑暗的掩护下潜入叛军营地。这一系列举动粉碎了叛军的士气，迫使他们放下武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行星上的看守遵照令人敬畏的太空野狼的建议，实施了一系列报复和恐吓行动。他们留下残破的尸体，在黑暗的掩护下潜入叛军营地。这一系列举动粉碎了叛军的士气，迫使他们放下武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siguiendo los consejos del formidable Lobo Espacial, los guardias llevaron a cabo una serie de represalias y actos intimidatorios. Dejando atrás cadáveres mutilados e infiltrándose en el campamento rebelde al amparo de la oscuridad, han minado la moral de los rebeldes y les han obligado a entregar las armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siguiendo los consejos del formidable Lobo Espacial, los guardias llevaron a cabo una serie de represalias y actos intimidatorios. Dejando atrás cadáveres mutilados e infiltrándose en el campamento rebelde al amparo de la oscuridad, han minado la moral de los rebeldes y les han obligado a entregar las armas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}恐ろしいスペース・ウルフの助言に従い、看守たちは報復と脅迫行為を実行に移した。切り刻まれた遺体を残し、闇に紛れて反乱軍の野営地に潜入した彼らは、反乱軍の士気を打ち砕き、無理やり武器を放棄させた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}恐ろしいスペース・ウルフの助言に従い、看守たちは報復と脅迫行為を実行に移した。切り刻まれた遺体を残し、闇に紛れて反乱軍の野営地に潜入した彼らは、反乱軍の士気を打ち砕き、無理やり武器を放棄させた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Suivant les conseils du terrible Space Wolf, les gardiens se livrent à toute une série d'actes d'intimidation et de représailles. Laissant des cadavres mutilés dans leur sillage et profitant de l'obscurité pour infiltrer le campement ennemi, ils brisent le moral des rebelles et les forcent à lâcher leurs armes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Suivant les conseils du terrible Space Wolf, les gardiens se livrent à toute une série d'actes d'intimidation et de représailles. Laissant des cadavres mutilés dans leur sillage et profitant de l'obscurité pour infiltrer le campement ennemi, ils brisent le moral des rebelles et les forcent à lâcher leurs armes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf Rat des formidablen Space Wolf führten die Wärter eine Reihe von Vergeltungs- und Einschüchterungsaktionen durch. Sie hinterließen verstümmelte Leichen, drangen im Schutz der Dunkelheit in das Lager der Rebellen ein und zerschlugen die Moral der Rebellen, die bald ihre Waffen niederlegten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following the advice given by the formidable Space Wolf, the wardens carried out a series of reprisals and acts of intimidation. Leaving behind mutilated corpses and infiltrating the rebel camp under the cover of darkness, they have crushed the rebels morale and forced them to surrender their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf Rat des formidablen Space Wolf führten die Wärter eine Reihe von Vergeltungs- und Einschüchterungsaktionen durch. Sie hinterließen verstümmelte Leichen, drangen im Schutz der Dunkelheit in das Lager der Rebellen ein und zerschlugen die Moral der Rebellen, die bald ihre Waffen niederlegten.{/n}
